Service Details: - Provides a full range of programs and services to the deaf, deaf-blind, deafened, and hard of hearing communities- Services include audiology services, interpreting services, counselling services, employment counselling services, seniors outreach program, communication devices showroom, informative classes, community presentations, and a resource centre for job seekers
